item.title: The Art of Loving in 2020
item.description: When we cannot trust the powers that be, we can turn to our own radical powers to Love.
item.dc:creator: Just Alfred

item.title: The Sound of Creation
item.description: If you could write music, how would you make creation sound?

item.description:
